signup_description: Enter your details to get started
auth_validation_name_min: Name must be at least 2 characters
auth_validation_name_max: Name must be at most 50 characters
auth_validation_email: Please enter a valid email address
auth_validation_password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth_validation_password_max: Password must be at most 128 characters
auth_validation_password_complexity: Password must contain letters and numbers
auth_error_user_already_exists: Email already in use. Try another.
auth_error_failed_to_create_user: Could not create account. Please try again.
auth_error_failed_to_create_session: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth_error_unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again.
